channel.title: Donator Chest [PI]
channel.description: I have a question for you fellers on dis hur moparscape. Is it possible to make a Donator Chest for PI?? and if so can someone point me in the right direction for a tut? (i have searched moparscape and google. Dont send me a let me google that for you link. :cool:)

@system wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:4, topic:398415”]Oh, lol. Then you would want to make a new int with item ids in it. Like this:

Then make this for where “WHAT YOU WANT THE CHEST TO DO”:

That should make it randomly give you an item.[/quote]
Tyvm. go out and buy yourself some cream corn you deserve it (there we go)

item.title: Donator Chest [PI]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:398415”]case ####:
if (c.isDonor == 1)
WHAT YOU WANT THE CHEST TO DO
break;[/quote]
dear Runewings,
i am a epic newb. and i understand the case and all that but where do i put this info? actionhandler? and idk what to put where you put “WHAT YOU WANT CHEST TO DO”. (i would like it to be where people draw once and they get a random items.)

        Sincerly,
                
           The gangsta newb I Evil I
